messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sitting on the Beach up North  WAS myers-briggs
messages.msgSnippet: WHY WOULDN T YOU!!! We could go to the beach and fish for rainbow trout or drive to Prince Rupert and sit in the black sand on the oceanic beach. Or we can go
messages.messageBody:
WHY WOULDN'T YOU!!!

We could go to the beach and fish for rainbow trout or drive to Prince Rupert and sit in the black sand on the oceanic beach. Or we can go someplace interesting. Got some local (artsy) water shots on the web, but one was in January (-20C)

Google some of these places and you'll see - it's not about igloos unless some unschool kids built one in their backyard! LOL!

My (resist the southern bias crap) thots

Tim Thomas
Prince George BC Canada

----- Original Message -----
From: starsuncloud@...
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2003 7:41 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] myers-briggs


In a message dated 6/11/2003 9:30:32 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Where? Please say Pacific NorthWest US. Or Canada.

But why would we want to be beach bums way up THERE!! :)
Nah, I'm waaaaay down in Pensacola, FL. It's not nearly so far away as the
keys....

Ren
